channel.title: |Split-Pk|317 Loading 703+ Everything You're Looking For!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3480811/logo.png[/img]
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52684611/overview.png[/img][/CENTER]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7pSSj_GVL04
[CENTER][B][U]Welcome To SplitPk.[/U][/B]
SplitPK was A project that was started by Enjoy/Ethan, We have put lots of content into the server and hope for you to come and check it all out. They believe that them long nights and long days have payed off, and believe to get very
far, we always put our players first in everything we do our Descicions, Planning, Updates, News Ect... We strive to be number-one and will never stop. Thank you for choosing us, and also have a wonderful day at SplitPK.
Are you ready for the challenge and the fun you're going to experience? Split-Pk has all types of playing styles, pking , active community ,active staff , and stable server. here at Split-Pk we make sureall our players questions are answered. our friendly staff members work hard everyday to insure a friendly and respected community. come join us here and i promise you that you will not regre your stay.
SplitPk is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.
Start playing now
There are two ways to play SplitPk, through our Webclient or through our downloadable client. The webclient is great if you're just starting out, however, the downloadable client is great for regular players as you can access it from your desktop!
Still not convinced?
Our server features a vibrant, helpful community with plenty of players on the server, friendly people, perfect combat, following and protection against cheaters and dupers. We also have some features that set us apart from the real
RuneScape game, including: SplitPk, our custom minigame, some custom items and weapons and different areas!
I Hope You Enjoy Playing SplitPk Rsps.
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52684611/links.png[/img]

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B] [URL=http://"http://splitpk.x10.mx/SplitPK/Terms.html"]Split-Pk Donate[/URL]
[B][U]Vote[/U][/B] [url=http://www.split-pk.org/vote/#?step=1]Split-PK - Voting[/url]
[B][U]Main Features[/U][/B]
Main Features*Custom Skillingarea
Full Screen: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2di2djo.png[/img]
*150+ Custom Items *Custom Minigames *Custom Client *Amazing Combat *Full Chaotic + PvP Armor Degrading *Fullscreen *Gameframe *All Nex Armours With Effect *Curses 100% *Quick Prayers *Skillng Zone *New Runescape Hitsplats *All Dupes Fixed *Many Pk Locations *All Skills Functioning *Dragon Claws 100% *Fast Fluid Client *New Runescape Cursors *Amazing Graphics *Xp Counter *Fun Minigames *Many Trainning Locations *A Lot Of Bosses *Fun Killstreak System *Symbol Support *Dicing -Cleaned Out Home (Removed/Moved/Added Objects) -Modified Quest Tab -Added A Uncheatable Pk Point System -Added A Uncheatable Kill Streak System -Cleaned/Edited Playersave.java -Modified The Trade System -Added A Report Abuse System ::Report Command -Added A Skilling Zone (With Shops) -Added A Fishing/Cooking Area -Added Rock Crab Trainning Area -Added Shadow Warriors Trainning Area -Added Duel Arena -Added Comp cape -Added Comp Cape Reqs -Fixed Eating Delays -Fixed Potion Drinking Delays -Fixed Animations With 2 Handed Weapons -Fixed Prayer Switching -Fixed A Lot Of Glitched Items -Added A Event System -Added Online Staff Command -Added Command Book (Given upon starter) -Added Rule Book (Given upon starter) -Cleaned Out A Lot Of Dead Code -Added A Vote System (Integrated With Both Forums & Server) -Added Shit Ton Of Shops -Fixed Prices -Cleaned Up Market Place - Pimped it out -Added Hybrid Den Pk -Improved Random Pk Reward System Greatly -Fixed Npc Hp When Over 255 -Added Correct D'haroks Formula -Fixed Pk Points Shop -Improved Shop System -Improved Pest Control - It;s Amazing -Added Control Panel -Added Clipped -Started Working On Achievement System -Organized File Packaging -Added A SkillHandler To Organize Skills -Rewrote Prayer -Rewrote Runecrafting -Rewrote Herblore -Rewrote Fishing -Rewrote Cooking -Rewrote Woodcutting -Worked On Packaging Again -Renamed Client -Fixed Crown Issue -Fixed Toggles -Fixed Jframe -Added Date & Time To Title -Added Perfect Switching -Reduced Memory -Symbols Supported (< > / \ ) -Renamed Some Objects -HD Players/Objects/NPCS -Added Password Support -Prioritized Menu Clicking -Proper Amount Formating -Added A ScreenShot Button On Jframe -Added 'Always On Top' Option On Jframe -Added Comp Cape -Added New Shop Interface -Fixed Object Shadowing -Fixed Jframe Frame (For Full Screen) -Chat Area Resets After Log out -Fixed Bug Where HP Doesn't Show Up If Over 100 -Added Face North -Added Fading Backgrounds -Added XP Counter -Added New Runescape Hitsplats -Added Login Message - Fullscreen Compatible -Added A Better Clan Chat Tab (Repositioned) -Fixed Em NUKE Trees -Added Wildy Worm Models -Added New Friends/Ignore Tab -Foxed Models Through Players -Added Auto Cache Downloader -Changed A Lot Of Npcs Names -Fixed Item Dragging -Added Runescape Cursors -Fixed Bugged Players & Items -Added Cache Downloader -Fixed White Screen During Cache Downloading -Fixed Private Messaging -Fixed Characters -Added Splash Screen System -Added New Login Box -Added New Loading Bar -Cleaned Out cache - More Organized

SplitPK was A project that was started by Enjoy/Ethan, We have put lots of content into the server and hope for you to come and check it all out. They believe that them long nights and long days have payed off, and believe to get very

SplitPk is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.

There are two ways to play SplitPk, through our Webclient or through our downloadable client. The webclient is great if you’re just starting out, however, the downloadable client is great for regular players as you can access it from your desktop!

Our server features a vibrant, helpful community with plenty of players on the server, friendly people, perfect combat, following and protection against cheaters and dupers. We also have some features that set us apart from the real
